reviewText:
Big perfect show, as usual at Mrbisch but no emotion, never, no fun, never.
Many changes, many arrangements in order to ruin the original material
and what hurts and irritates is the assumption that this kind of performances
offer something INTELLIGENT!. How comforting to have the cds with
Gedda and Streich for a right consolation to forget this pain.
Ernesto Oppicelli - Genova Certosa/Italien
